product.longDescription: Medium-long, 7–8" roots are uniform, thick, slightly tapered, and blunt. Excellent eating quality both fresh and after long-term storage, with juicy texture and sweet, complex flavor. A great choice for fall and winter harvest. Tops are vigorous, fast, and healthy for better field-holding and mechanical harvesting. High resistance to Alternaria blight and powdery mildew; and intermediate resistance to cavity spot, bacterial blight, and Cercospora blight. Heavy Nantes type. Avg. 16,800 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Ideal storage carrot. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.
